name: Opportunity Add KRW
script:
if doc.currency == "USD":
    filters2 = [["from_currency", "=", doc.currency],["to_currency", "=", "CAD"]]
    exchange_rate2 = frappe.get_last_doc("Currency Exchange", filters2, order_by="name desc")
    doc.cad_exchange_rate = exchange_rate2.exchange_rate
    filters1 = [["from_currency", "=", doc.currency],["to_currency", "=", "KRW"]]
    exchange_rate1 = frappe.get_last_doc("Currency Exchange", filters1, order_by="name desc")
    doc.krw_exchange_rate = exchange_rate1.exchange_rate
    doc.conversion_amount = exchange_rate1.exchange_rate * doc.opportunity_amount
